website_summaries.verdict: Students on a budget should consider the X4650, but only against the vast raft of other MFDs on the market.
cons: Photo printing is slow and average

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wireless printer with mac laptop and airport extreme
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an easy-to-use wireless home printer (the scanning and copying were just a bonus). This one is wonderful. I'm using a MacBook Pro and have an Airport Extreme Wireless router. Follow the instructions step by step for the setup. After installing the software, I hooked up the printer to the laptop and finished the setup. Once it was all done, I was able to unplug the printer and move it all the way down the hall into a back room out of the way. It immediately found the signal again and worked smoothly. Just keep it filled with paper and I can print from anywhere in the house. Very quiet operation.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Guither

customer_reviews.title: This thing has SUCK written all over it.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this printer for two years. It is the most finicky, wasteful, defective printer I've ever owned. It wastes ink like you wouldn't believe! The cartridges are made so that refilling is impossible. I bought the XL cartridges for $80 dollars a pair and I am having problems with the printer saying that the cartridges are misaligned. I would love to throw this piece of s*** in the trash and I will once I finish the cartridge that I just stupidly bought for it. NEVER BUY LEXMARK!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The printer works as described and the WiFi is sensitive enough to receive signals several rooms away. The original print cartridges don't contain a lot of ink and, as usual, replacements are a bit expensive. They can not be refilled and that is one reason for the just oK rating. The included CD contains a scan program that I have yet gotten to work, probably my fault. The copy feature is really good; that's one reason I bought the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: technophobe dream
customer_reviews.text: When our old dell died, our kids gave us a lenovo S10. We loved it and decided not to get a new desktop, but we needed a printer. Ordered this one, which arrived in record time. Included directions were sparse and we can't install a disk on our lenovo, so we went to the web site and downloaded directions-and they worked. That's it, folks-they worked, and that's all I want from a product, to do what it says without my having to take a course to figure it out. I feel like a genius (ok, I'm really bad at computers but I'm getting better every day) because a product did what it said-I wish all transactions were this easy.
customer_reviews.author: ani

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Easy and Affordable!!
customer_reviews.text: When this printer arrived I thought 'OK this is going to require some time to deal with all the network headaches'. So I put the disk in the drive, followed the extremely easy instructions, and everything was done in about 2 minutes! (I almost think an illiterate could follow the pictures and get the job done) It literally took longer to unpack the printer from the box, than it did to set it up. A great bargain too! It works great! Even the guy at my local Best Buy recommended Lexmark, but said they don't carry them. Now I know why he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill P.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for a casual user, but the software is bugging and so is the connectivity
customer_reviews.text: 90% of the time I want this printer to work it does. But Everyonce in a while I must turn it and my entire computer to reset it and to get it to work again. Also, I trouble getting the wireless to work, which may have been me or maybe the product lacks a little in userability as I am a fairly competent computer user. On the other hand I paid $55 for this thing so I should and did not expect a lot. So decent for the price, only get if you are a causual user.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Tatoll

customer_reviews.title: Very picky about when it wants to work
customer_reviews.text: Scanner works like a charm all the time. No hassles. Printer was problematic from the get-go and has stopped working for quite some time. The document feeder mechanism is the culprit. It just won't align, and if it did, "paper jam" is a message you can bet on. Wireless. Works the first time, and then it won't. Restarting everything will seem to solve the problem for that instance. Repeat the cycle. So I gave up on wireless. Does not recognize all USB flash drive to save the scanned images. SD cards have a better success rate. Will not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vino

customer_reviews.title: Best printer I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is so easy to use. The ink cartridges last a long time, even after the printer says the ink is low. This is the second printer I have owned with this model number. It is well worth the money to get this. It prints clear, and is the best printer I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Ducky

customer_reviews.title: pos
customer_reviews.text: I've never had so many paper jams or "out of paper" msgs as i have with this printer. I had same model before & it didn't do this.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Worst Printer I have ever Setup or Encountered
customer_reviews.text: The drivers for this printer are horrible, the connections for the printer are terrible. I would rather connect via a network connection, printing PS files from Unix in Courier than deal with this crappy printer. I have setup and maintained many lab printers and personal printers in my IT career and this one is by far one of the worst to set-up. The Wifi connection drops everytime it goes to sleep, the drivers are full of unnecessary bloatware and I'm tired of reinstalling the software. Lexmark used to mean quality but after the X4650, it sucks. Do not buy this printer!
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this printer for about 2 months now and I'm very satisfied. I consider the price competitive with the non-wireless all-in-one printers currently available. Setup was fairly simple and straightforward; it took about 20 minutes to set everything up. I haven't tried scanning and saving any documents, but I've been happy with the print quality and speed, wireless and the copy feature. The ink usage hasn't seemed too aggressive, and the default settings have been efficient for my documents.
customer_reviews.author: rysnyd

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back becaus it only used black ink and was refurbished and couldn't get it to work right
customer_reviews.author: Rosie0529

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: Great printer, cheap, easiest setup,and lots of features. The only thing I do not like and it is not the printers fualt, but every time I want to print a document I have to turn the firewall off on my security program, just thought I would throw that in to save some people some time when it happens to them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Great, until you need ink, then throw it away!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a light to average printer. Five months after buying this printer, I need new black and color ink. To get new cartridges, it costs between $40-$45. So since I'm looking at replacing these twice a year, I am going back to my old, crappy (but refillable) HP printer. I really feel that Lexmark is unethical. Somehow it cuts off your ink supply before it even completely runs out. Then it shutsdown until you order a new cartridge through Lexmark. It will not allow refills or over the counter brands. Lexmark is the scum of the earth, which is a shame because the printer actually works, but I won't be held hostage.
customer_reviews.author: R. Crain

customer_reviews.title: Rather pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this printer after reading several other reviews listed on Amazon. I was looking for a wireless printer to use with my new laptop; so far this one has fulfilled my need. The only problem that I have experienced is that sometimes it does not print multiple pages of a document. I haven't yet figure out what causes that, but all in all the printer is quite nice. slawrence Maryland
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: I never knew printing would be this easy!
customer_reviews.text: Set up was quick and easy, it took about 30 minutes all together. I had to download the driver from the website since I am working on a netbook but wicked happy to see that it was easily available. I can scan documents and send them wirelessly and they show up on my computer. It has a slot for every type of memory car I have ever seen in addition to a usb cable where you can directly connect the camera. So Far so good, but I have only had it going for aprox. 2 hours.. I will update this if anything goes wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Doot

customer_reviews.title: Printhead concerns
customer_reviews.text: Although the printer provides excellent quality, if left standing with the ink cartridges in it for an extended period (say your vacation) the ink could have a tendency to dry and plug the print head. To clean them is expensive & troublesome. This is the second unit that I have had this problem with and it usually happens after the warranty has expired.
customer_reviews.author: AHL

customer_reviews.title: SIx months and I still love this printer!
customer_reviews.text: After six months of using this printer I am still nothing but thrilled with this printer. I have added 3 more computers to my household since I got this printer, each was so simple to setup. On top of that with Lexmarks printer recycle program, black ink cartridges cost me 12.00, and color is 16.00, cannot beat that. On top of the excellent ink prices, It is nice to know this came with a 3 year warranty. Print quality is excellent as well! For the price guys you cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrax

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted in a printer
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is the perfect home printer. It's fast, works seamlessly with my laptop and wireless router, was a cinch to set up, and has a scanner, which works great. I have had it for about 2 months now. I haven't used it to print any photos, so I can't vouch for that function. All said, this was a great deal and is a great printer.
customer_reviews.author: IRasisetheRoof

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic Lexmark all in one printer. For the scanner, you will have to scan page by page. I have had it for over a year, and so far it still does the job. The ink cartridge runs about $25 to $30 each. Not too bad. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: piece of crap, no USB connection 6/7 days in a week
customer_reviews.author: Hua, Jin Chen

customer_reviews.title: EASY INSTRUCTIONS ON CD
customer_reviews.text: This has the best cd instructions I've seen on any home printer. And it allows you not to install all the additional crap, like online monitoring, ads, etc. that you can't choose not to install on other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Berger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works like new!!! Can't figure out the wi-fi if You can help. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Tops in printing
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome in so many ways. SO EZ to set up on all my computers. The printing is so fast AND it is so quiet as my cat sleeps next to it! Lexmark rules...OH, did I mention the price?!?! VERY reasonable. Thanx!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kota

customer_reviews.title: It's a great printer - but would be better if the set up wizard actually worked with my wireless
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice printer, but just be aware that it might not be configured for your wireless settings. I have AT&T U-Verse, and they told me that it can't support this printer at this time for whatever reason. (And yes, I get it, the wizard is quite well-designed - it just couldn't make the connection with my wireless.) On the bright side the plug and play is great, so I can still use it...but I don't have the wireless access I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ro

customer_reviews.title: cheap but keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I have had this printer set up a week. I bought it because it was wireless though the wireless function doesn't actually work on it, so I have to plug my laptop into it anytime I want to print something which is a burden. The print quality is also very poor and the printer is SLOOOOW!
customer_reviews.author: slong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased two of these. Very durable and reliable. Ink is costly.
customer_reviews.author: E Fed

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark printer
customer_reviews.text: I love Lexmark. Their products are always so much easier to use that other brands. I guess one would say they are more user friendly
customer_reviews.author: BJM

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my new laptop and it was a snap to get it up and running and does what I need it to do. It comes on when I ask it to print but otherwise, you never know it is there. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kennith A. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year old and it has jammed for the last time. Can't get Lexmark to respond. I'm sending it to eRecycle and buying an HP. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: debi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Great multi function printer, Works great, and last a long time. Would buy again IF it ever stops! It's still working PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Got this printer about two months ago. I don't print a whole lot (a few pages a week) but setup was very easy from each computer. If you have any firewall software installed check to allow the Lexmark program from connecting to your network. Otherwise had it installed in about 10-15 minutes. I have not used the scanning capabilities yet.
customer_reviews.author: Daymaker

customer_reviews.title: Lexmart Wireless Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, was very easy to set up and works great. It came in just a few days and arrived in excellent condition. Best printer I have ever used, highly recommend this product to anyone looking for new printer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It would not communicate well w windows 8 finally had to replace it
customer_reviews.author: busyworkingmom1

customer_reviews.title: Remember to buy cartridges!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wireless printer at a great price point! Does not come with ink cartridges so remember to throw them in your cart before you cash out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brennan

customer_reviews.title: This is my first Lexmark purchase.  I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I found nothing wrong about this item. The only thing that I can say is, I have to download an update of the driver for my Macbook but is not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie W. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: great small printer
customer_reviews.text: Great printer for those small print jobs at home. Easy to set up - even for someone with not many computer skills. Produces a good quality print. Very economical.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: good all-in-one printer, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This is a good printer for its price. It's very easy to set up on mac. I didn't try setting it up from Windows, but I would imagine it should be fairly easy as well. The printer can scan and send image files to selected computers over the wireless network, which I found extremely handy. The only thing i'm not happy with is that it didn't come with a USB cable, which is needed to set it up. Otherwise, I would give it a 5 star rating. I had to borrow one to finish the initial setting up. But after that, the cable is no longer needed.
customer_reviews.author: yuexb

customer_reviews.title: Printer review
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in good condition. Had to call Lexmark in order to set up for 64 bit computer. Lexmark solved all problems. Good support.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: A great printer and a great brand. The wi-fi printing is a great addition and allows me to print anywhere in the house or backyard. Perfect for students!
customer_reviews.author: T. Chang

customer_reviews.title: My new printer
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Easy to set up and get connected to my computers. Love the product for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRINTER!
customer_reviews.text: I RESEARCHED ONLINE AND SEVERAL STORES FOR A PRINTER. WENT ONLINE TO AMAZON WITH MY SPECIFICATIONS FOR A PRINTERS. I KNEW NOTHING ABOUT PRINTERS. THEY WERE A BIG HELP. THEY WOULD SENT NOTIFICATIONS ON PRINTERS WITH WHAT I REQUESTED. THIS LEXMARK PRINTER IS A GREAT PRICE, PRINTS CLEAR, AND SET-UP WAS SO EASY. I WAS ABLE TO DO IT MYSELF WITHIN 15 MIN.. YOU WON'T BE SORRY PURCHASING THIS PRINTER!
customer_reviews.author: CJO

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This printer is easy to set up and use in the wireless mode. Although my firewall complicated the installation, Lexmark technical support was able to resolve the problem. Prints are crisp and clear. Only issue to me is small paper capacity compared to a laser, but performance is good - very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: SkyeNJane

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: A great printer for the price. Still using it. I would recommend it or a more up to date product.
customer_reviews.author: Nat Fruci

customer_reviews.title: Not in as good of shape as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The item was delivered in a timely manor but the condition was less than average. The printer only prints 1 or 2 pages at a time and then it has to be powered off and back on again for the next page to print. Very frustrating when printing multiple pages.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: The printer works fine. I didn't try to set up the wireless feature, just seemed too complicated. Everything else was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: B. Castiel

customer_reviews.title: Bada Bing!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice printer for the money. The set up was easy. No pop-ups from the install disk after setup which HP and others are known for! Having the wireless feature is fantastic. Currently serving two laptops seamlessly. I really like having the ability to scan documents and choose the wireless destination. Would highly recommend this printer. A true value at the low purchase price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ardagna

customer_reviews.title: wireless anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the wireless set up. There was no need. Easy to follow directions in the set up wizard. Loaded the drivers on kids net books. everyone can print from anywhere in the house. ( or yard )
customer_reviews.author: B. Bruckman

customer_reviews.title: NO SUPPORT FOR WINDOWS 7
customer_reviews.text: This printer works fine when using USB cables, however I am not able to do wireless printing. I checked the Lexmark website and found that it doesn't support Windows 7 (I have a brand new laptop). Also, I am getting a weird message since installing the printer software: Microsoft.Net Framework 2.0 must be downloaded (in order for everything to work correctly). Well, I tried to download it from the MS website and the graphics that come up are so old looking this must be an ancient application - then it finally says it doesn't support 64 bit. So far, I am really disappointed - I guess there was a reason it was on sale.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Good for PC, not mac.
customer_reviews.text: This printer prints well over wireless to PC's but I could not get it to print over wireless with my macbook pro. Thankfully, it will print from my mac if using the included usb cable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Braden-Pane

customer_reviews.title: Very good printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. All the features work great. I had a little trouble when I tried to set it up because it didn't recognize my windows 7 os. But, I contacted the support service via chat and they sent me the link to install the drive. All is good now and I love it. Easily one of my best amazon purchases!!
customer_reviews.author: zeray

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this printer.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this Lexmark all in one printer. It was easy to connect and having the scanner is a real plus. I have had no problems with it. I would reccommend this product especially at this low price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Krings

customer_reviews.title: Scanner does not work
customer_reviews.text: This printer is quick and quiet. The problem I have is the scanner will not work. It prints and copies but when I select scan it says "downloading application" and then does not work. Anyone else have this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Truman

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: If you don't need to fax, this is your printer! Prints, scans, and COPIES with the much higher-priced models! Good for everyday home use.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Reliable printer and copies
customer_reviews.text: Have had this printer more than 5 years now....still working great. Ink usage is very reasonable as well. I highly recommend this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an inexpensive wireless printer that wouldn't take up too much space and this is perfect. Set up was a snap and surprisingly the printer is quiet. I would recommend this printer to anyone that has a need for multiple use printing at home.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: * had one of these printers, but due to ...
customer_reviews.text: * had one of these printers, but due to an accident, it quit working, so when I saw Amazon had one more, I decided to get it and keep on printing.
customer_reviews.author: George Throckmorton

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: This combination Printer/Scanner/Copier is attractive, easy to setup & use and produces good output. It is excellent value for the $. It is my 2nd Lexmark wireless & I'm a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Don Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup, WIFI works great, and print quality is pretty decent for the price. Even the scanner quality is adequate. VERY happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Metzger

customer_reviews.title: You will spend a fortune on ink! I hate this printer!
customer_reviews.text: This printer has been difficult from day one. If your computer sleeps or is shut off for any reason it will not always link up with the printer. You have to shut down both systems and reboot and then just hope they're communicating with eachother. Also, it uses so much ink. I print out less than 100 sheets and it's already needing replacement. Horrible. Run the other direction.
customer_reviews.author: kidsallthetime

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark x4650 Wireless All-in-One Printer
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this printer is good. But if you gonna put this printer some where high, you might wanna choose the one with the adjustable screen.
customer_reviews.author: Tam N. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Printer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and setup. Works just as should. Love the fact that I can print from laptop from anywhere in house without a network.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: user
customer_reviews.text: The printer was easy to set up. The wireless feature is great. Scans and documents are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: William Judd

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this thing set up and working in a matter of minutes. GREAT PRINTER.
customer_reviews.author: Kent W. Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased wirh Lexmark x4650 Wireless All -In -One
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved Lexmark Printers. This wireless printer was easy to set-up and use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Good printer, copier, scanner
customer_reviews.text: Only wish it had automatic feed for scanner. Pain to do one by one.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after three months. Tried unloading and relaoding software and connected direclty to he USB port but still would not work. Don't waste you money.
customer_reviews.author: kharr

customer_reviews.title: Used parts off this product for my original printer
customer_reviews.text: I used this purchase to fix my original Lexmark printer. The paper holder fit perfectly. Now I have two printers I could, if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lowry

customer_reviews.title: LEXMARK X4650 PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a Lexmark X3650. This was the next step up. Hope it serves me as well as the old one did, 5 1/2 years
customer_reviews.author: Anita McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice printer
customer_reviews.text: the printer works great, but have some trouble with the wireless part. Other than that its a great all in one
customer_reviews.author: Alison Shuker

product_meta.title: Lexmark X4650 Multifunction Printer (16F1400)
product_meta.description: The Lexmark X4650 Wireless All-In-One that lets you easily print, copy, scan and print gives you flexibility to print wherever you wish. Produce up to 25 black or up to 18 color printed pages per minute. Printing pictures directly from memory card slots, PictBridge compatible cameras or USB flash drives is easy. Optical Character Recognition (OCR) software allows you to easily scan text documents into soft copy format. The Lexmark toolbar makes Internet printing easy, by enabling you to schedule print jobs from your favorite Web sites, on a recurring basis. The flatbed scanner allows you to scan various media sizes and thicknesses, including books.
feature_bullets: 1-touch copy and scan photo feature without a PC
Up to 25 black or up to 18 color printed pages per minute

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars188 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
